domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category

text:
@EcoSenseNow Israel (which is only starting to have hot weather now) DID have a strict lockdown until last week and only now is easing up somewhat.
We have 31 deaths per million (below the global average).
https://t.co/Hdq58AVO5h
Our test rate is high: 56,140 per million (in the top 20)
